thread.title: Kourtney And Khloé Were Late For A Workout And Kim Was Pissed
thread.title_full: Kourtney And Khloé Were Late For A Workout And Kim Was Pissed

author: Sheridan Watson
title: Kourtney And Khloé Were Late For A Workout And Kim Was Pissed
text:
View this image ›
Mike Coppola / Getty Images ID: 10467630 2. Kim was sitting in her garage with her friend Nicky (Nikki? Nicki?), waiting for their trainer Joe to show up. But he was late. HE WAS LATE. And why? Her sisters, of course. This injustice could have gone unnoticed but luckily Kim documented it all on Snapchat: Loading View on Instagram
instagram.com “Thanks, assholes.”
ID: 10467634 3. Apparently Kourtney and Khloé started their own workout with Joe a whole 30 MINUTES LATE, which meant that Kim had to start HER workout late. View this image ›
Dimitrios Kambouris / Getty Images / BuzzFeed ID: 10467637 4. KIM WAS NOT PLEASED — SHE HAS A LIFE, PEOPLE. Loading View on Instagram
instagram.com If you thought someone saying “Fuck you” was terrifying, just wait until someone says it while in a terrifying bunny filter.
ID: 10467639 5. Thanks to the prayers, kickstarters, and candlelight vigils of millions of people*, Joe finally arrived to Kim’s garage gym. Loading View on Instagram
instagram.com *this is a joke. IT IS A JOKE.
ID: 10467640 6. And when he finally showed up, Kim got to the bottom of it. Turns out Kourtney was LATE, making Joe LATE, making Kim LATE. THE HORROR. Loading View on Instagram
instagram.com Joe tried to take the blame but the guilt became too much and he cracked under the intense interrogation.
ID: 10467650 7. Alas, Kim finally got to start her workout and she jumped her way to inner peace. Loading View on Instagram
instagram.com ID: 10467641 8. Kourtney, Khloé, how do you sleep at night. HOW DO YOU SLEEP? View this image ›
Frederick M. Brown / Getty Images / BuzzFeed ID: 10467643
 More News About Kim Kardashian
